thread.title: Stanley Sikora
thread.title_full: Reservation Counter reviewed by Stanley Sikora

author: Stanley Sikora
title: Stanley Sikora
text:
Still having trouble using my rewards number to log-in!
After spending time last week with rep from your company on the phone and computer & resetting my account and password I still can not log in with them! If it wasn't for the fact that Conference is at your hotel I would have booked at a Wyndham hotel nearby!
